summary: Area 51 is a secret U.S. Air Force base in Nevada. It's used for testing new planes and weapons. The government kept it a secret for a long time, which made people think there were aliens and UFOs there. In 2013, the CIA said it was real, but they didn't share many details. Area 51 is near Las Vegas, and the mystery around it makes the area a popular tourist spot.
title: Area 51
